website_summaries.verdict: Once the top-of-the-line in cell phone protection, the DEFENDER still provides serious impact resistance, but it has some quirks that disappoint owners of previous-generation models.
pros: Excellent drop and impact protection plus good looks
Holster can also be used as a kickstand when hands-free use is necessary
cons: Doesn't come with a screen protector like older DEFENDER cases
Holster clip is somewhat flimsy and must be removed to take photos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My dad dropped his phone and realized a couple minutes later that it was in a bonfire. The picture shows the back cover which melted a bit. Saved his new phone. He will only use otter box!
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: 0 protection
customer_reviews.text: First time I've ever seen an otter box I wasn't happy with.. First time my phone dropped it broke. I used to swear by this company now I'm wondering if I will ever trust it again. Defender series used to be able to take a beating... now it's just a fancy paperweight. Loose fitting outer case, no screen protection, little if any shock protection. Looks like they tried to make it as cheap as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Peter McCann

customer_reviews.title: Rugged case without excess bulk
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, durable case provides great protection for my phone. The raised edges ensure that my screen never touches the floor when I (frequently) drop my phone! The raised edges also provide protection if your phone is placed screen down - the screen will not touch the surface. It's easy to use and comfortable to hold. Easy to slide in and out of a pocket - great protection without excess bulk. I do wish that the back had a little more "grip" to it to prevent it from being quite so slippery, but it is still better than most I've found. Overall, this is a great case and offers very good protection but could use a little more grip.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Brouillette

customer_reviews.title: ... when I got this case I was really not happy to see it why because it has no screen ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my daughter s8 new phone for full protection but when I got this case I was really not happy to see it why because it has no screen protector including in this new case probably they stopped making before it we bought fifteens otter box case in past five years every case comes with screen protector I bought this for high school going teenage for full protection I don't see any difference between defender series and commuter I am still looking for case with screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: seema sony

customer_reviews.title: I like OtterBox product
customer_reviews.text: I like OtterBox product. they have never failed to secure my phone. This is my 4th purchase because I trust them. The camo design from RealTree looks amazing. The problem 90% of it faded in just 2 months!! I put my phone in my jacket pocket all the time and take it out. I also put the phone in my pants pockets. When I put on a table it goes face down so I can see the design. I am going to purchase a sticker because it now looks very bad. I really wanted to give it 1 star, but the cover is still functional. They must improve the ink used here to make this last!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Solid Design, Build Quality & Features
customer_reviews.text: The case is very well designed to protect the S8. Edges are well protected and remain accessible for swiping with fingers. Awesome! It is available in multiple colors, so I bought one for my wife and myself. Very happy with the product, after a few weeks of use. The holster serves as a tabletop stand, and is bullet proof protection when traveling, however, it is detachable, so it is not required for normal use. Therefore, I consider the clip-on carrier tray an option, and a necessity for some people; it is a free bonus at the price point that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Eye4one

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my S8 perfectly, cute pattern, easy to hold onto, came with a belt clip and everything. The phone itself is so narrow that adding the case doesn't detract at all. In fact, it helps me hold onto it better. I do wish it came up a bit higher around the sides of the screen. I'm worried that if the phone falls on its face (even with the glass protector), the screen could get damaged since only the top and bottom edges of the case are higher than the screen. Hope I never have to find out.
customer_reviews.author: A. Elliss

customer_reviews.title: Your Market
customer_reviews.text: You need to design an Otterbox that can take a phone like a Samsung S8 example and design a otterbox that will take a small phone and make it feel like a V60. That would Better meet the needs of men with LARGE hands. I have research a group of large men and they agree that this indeed would be a marketable product. The design could be designed to cater to the controls on the left then have a guided plunger for the only control on the right with a spacer block on the right To meet the increased size I'm certain your design engineers can developers an outstanding product. GOOD LUCK
customer_reviews.author: mandog1949

customer_reviews.title: The defender series might be overkill, but I'd rather ...
customer_reviews.text: The defender series might be overkill, but I'd rather pay 20$ for this case than 700$ for a replacement phone or several hundred $ for insurance. Doesn't interfere with the edges. Works well with the ArmorSuit MilitaryShield, which also may not be necessary but the security is well worth 7$.
customer_reviews.author: Caniche

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I will trust my phone to no other brand than an otterbox defender. The ONLY reason this product receives a 4 in durability is the rubber stretches over time (because duh its rubber) and does not seal properly to the plactic case frame, thus causing me to have to replace it about every 6 months or so I drop my phone at least 3x daily on concrete or tile from standard phone use height (3+ feet) and not a crack scratch or dent on it. I am a grade A certified klutz and this case holds its own. 10/10 will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Anais

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: As far as looks, I like it once I got it on for sure but after having it a while now and have taken it off a couple times for cleaning the plastic skeleton of it is a little weaker being really delicate looking from the start. I could probably break that part with two fingers honestly. Then the rubber outter skin was more fuss to put on than most other cases I've used for any phone I've had. It will probably come off and back on a few more times before I have to find another one
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rosseau

customer_reviews.title: Still loving this line of products!
customer_reviews.text: I only purchased this because my old otterbox is finally three years old and I've about beat it to death. To its credit, it's saved my phone more times than I can count - on the job site, on the motorcycle, from simple clumsiness, and just from life in general. I liked it so much that I decided to buy another one so the rubber would fit a little better on the case. After three years of wear and tear the rubber outer layer was just a little loose. As long as they keep makin' em, I'll keep buyin' em! I usually get one each time I get a new phone. Same brand, same style. They make a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job of protecting my Samsung Galaxy 8 - the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, stylish. Wish the protective cover was included. Seems asinine that the cover must be purchased separately. Does a great job of protecting my Samsung Galaxy 8 - the first couple of drops were ok. But, the one that damaged the cover was a drop only a foot and a half off the ground. The force of impact hit the top right corner. The screen protector (OtterBox, Alpha Glass) splintered and pieces fell out.
customer_reviews.author: TxBert

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: There was a time when Otter Box was the name for cell phone cases. That time has passed. I've bought Otters exclusively since my iPhone 3. Up until this S8 case. Price has stayed the same, quality has declined and no screen protector any more. Camo graphics rubbed off almost immediately. It's a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Cain

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with product or service
customer_reviews.text: Overall otterbox is a good case however I returned the first one I purchased because the inner case didn't snapped together correctly had gaps and parts that wouldn't stay closed. The outter rubber section also had gaps and a bubble around (otterbox I purchased in past never had these problems). When I received my replacement it had the exact same defects in exact same spots (almost certain they sent me the same one I retuned to Kohls location). Instead of returning again I just rigged it together and hoped for the best. Not happy about situation at all but had to make it work because I needed a case.
customer_reviews.author: Lakessha

customer_reviews.title: This case is good, but it tends to "peel" on the back
customer_reviews.text: This case is good, but it tends to "peel" on the back. Also, my daughter dropped her phone and the glass cracked (while having the case on). Apparently if your phone hits just the right way, it's not as secure as you'd think!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Works To Protect Phone
customer_reviews.text: As a fan of the Otterbox Defender when my mom and I had a Samsung GS4 phone, when we upgraded it was a logical step to rely on the same thing for the Samsung GS8. The only downside to this one is the lack of a screen protector. It holds up pretty well. I don't recommend doing this on purpose, but my phone has tumbled down the stairs and the screen has remained intact. It has dropped face down and remained intact and functional. This definitely protects the phone from dust, dirt, and occasional drops. I trust Otterbox's Defender line to protect my phones. I'll keep buying them as long as they keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great design, protection, quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! have used a lot, and taken my phone in and out of the case to run with an armband, so due to this reason one of the clips that the plastic pieces sandwich the phone in broke. But, it still holds the phone just fine. I have dropped my phone across concrete and not a single thing happened to my phone, and barely touched my case.. This is great quality and love the design. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AutumnRose

customer_reviews.title: Quality went down the drain once China took over!
customer_reviews.text: No more protective display cover but Costs the SAME price! I bought one for my wife and 1 for me, but they didn't last 3 months before the retainer from BOTH of the cases wore out! Quality REALLY went down once these stopped being made in the U.S. and started being made in China! Do yourself a favor and buy a leather holster with a magnetic closure.
customer_reviews.author: 1guyshopping

customer_reviews.title: No camo problems on mine!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased mine in early 2019 and have NOT had the camo scratch off at all. Maybe fixed? Case works great on my Galaxy 8 and was at a good price for this brand. Disassembly has always been difficult with Otterbox, but that is probably good since it protects so well. Only downside is you have to get a screen protector. I bought a knock-off brand for 10 bucks and seems to work great.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Till

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: The case is well made, as you'd expect from Otterbox but the case or bezel doesn't protrude past the surface of the screen, so you have very limited protection from "flat strikes". I went years without breaking a screen protector and broke one within a week of getting this. Also, a pop socket won't stick to this case. Finally, though this has nothing to do with Otterbox, I recommend not getting a phone with a curved screen. It adds nothing and makes screen protectors much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Can't get a better case for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't get a better case for the price! I know though that it doesn't have the screen protector because of the curved screen. I ordered a separate screen protector from IQ shield that is a great deal. 2 for like 9$. Love otterbox Defender cases. Have dropped it several times. NO damage.!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but flawed
customer_reviews.text: This case is very protective of the phone, but the rubber that covers both the audio plug in and charging area has flaws. Though it does protect those areas, there is evident wear and tear from opening and closing the rubber covers. If you can convert to wireless charging and wireless earbuds, this is perfect. Otherwise, it is still cheaper to buy another one of these cases then a new phone. This is the only case that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: This thing was designed to maximize your chances of breaking ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was designed to maximize your chances of breaking your phone. It's only held to the holster by a little clip, and when released the phone is ready to be launched to the sidewalk. WTF OtterBox engineers?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Belt clip issue
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad, I have always brought OtterBox cases for 8 plus years. I can understand about no screen protector as the s8 has a curved screen. But even the belt clip leaves me unhappy. Push down on the phone alittle and it pops off of it while on my belt. I had to add post it's to the corners. " See pictures" Replacement still a huge disappointment. Phone freaking drop off the belt clip getting out of the car. Thankful it fell screen up and nothing happened to the phone. I will try another product. Otterbox say buy to a long time customer.
customer_reviews.author: bam

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Fail, broken phone
customer_reviews.text: This was my second Otterbox for this phone. The first Otterbox broke and fell apart. I will admit, I drop my phone a lot. This time the phone landed perfectly flat on its face and it wasn't even that far of a fall. The Otterbox broke (in the same places my first one broke, along the bottom at the corners) and my screen is shattered in the corner near one of the breaks in the Otterbox. Phones are too expensive to have your protective gear fail.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Dinham

customer_reviews.title: phone still damaged during small drop
customer_reviews.text: Sadly although liking this product at first, I dropped my phone the other day and it is now not able to turn on, suggesting the impact damaged the internals of the phone, which I am surprised about as this case is meant to be one of the best out there and prevent against damage during these small drops. I tried to look at the warranty to see if I could be reimbursed for the case as i no longer have a working phone that fits and it didn't protect against what it was meant to but this doesn't seem possible. So a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jen b.

customer_reviews.title: Too Legit to quit
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case on my Galaxsy S9 since the phone came out. The other day I forgot my phone on the roof on my car. I died a little as I watched it tumble in the highway and get run over by a group of cars....went back to find the phone with only a few small cracks on the back plate. Case was finished so I ordered again. I'm an Ottorbox customer for life. This is a legit case.
customer_reviews.author: R&D

customer_reviews.title: durable case.. does the job!
customer_reviews.text: had the exact same otterbox case on mySamsung s8 play case we can't begin to fall apart with the plastic underneath the rubber outer cover... bought this case and it is solid again and feels like holding a new phone ...love the OtterBox case... I have never had a problem with damaging a phone when dropped... prefer the no screen cover easier to use the touch screen... again with the Samsung s8 never worry about a scratched screen.. I run my business on my cell phone so a good case is essential to keeping my phone safe.. not flashy but does the job...
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't protect from screen cracking
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, feel & size. Unfortunately, it has not protected my phone the way previous Otterboxes have. Because of the curved S8 screen, Otterbox opted to have no screen protector on this model. I bought a separate one, thinking the combination would protect from cracks & scratches. But with even small drops (it's like toddler hands are coated in butter or something!), my screen has cracked several times. Not face down drops, mind you - short drops where the phone landed on the back or edge. I've typically loved my Otterboxes, but this design fails to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: L. Honey

customer_reviews.title: Recommender
customer_reviews.text: Got the aqua mint color OtterBox case for my sister and she absolutely loves it. It's not like the traditional OtterBox that we were used to. Usually the OtterBox cases are thicker with a plastic screen covering attached to the case. This case however is slim but padded and has done a good job keeping my sister's phone whole. My sister is a little rough on her phones. Once she shut the car door on the phone haha and it was an accident. Overall it not only has a stylish color but it is durable. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even though it is made in the USA is not like the previous Otter Defender cases
customer_reviews.text: Just 1 Star because there are NO zero stars.... ...Do not purchase this item. Even though it is made in the USA is not like the previous Otter Defender cases. Since I bought my first Samsung Galaxy S4, Otter was my obvious choise for protecting my investment. Those previous cases are just like the they Ive opened them. Minor details, but just like new. This new Otter Defender case for the S8, is not made with the same standard or quality. Just look at the picture, take note that not even half a year has passed and its already deteriorated.
customer_reviews.author: Gundisallvus

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! It took a bit to get used to ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It took a bit to get used to how bulky it felt (although it's really not that bulky). There is no screen protector over the actual screen, but I knew that when I bought it and got a pack of the plastic film type screen protectors and the case does not interfer with it. My case did come with a holster clip which is also handy! Overall, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: The case was at a great price! I can already tell it is much more durable than the other two cases I had within the past year. I love the color! I think the covers over the ports and plug connections are a fantastic idea! I have know idea why I didn't buy the OtterBox sooner. Doesn't add too much bulk or weight either. I definitely recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: JulieCski

customer_reviews.title: I very much like the case
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the case; however, I wish that it came with some type of screen protector. I did purchase the thin-film protector and that works well to keep fingerprints off the screen. I understand why a screen protector was not included as one can choose glass or plastic, and the glass one is expensive. It is a shame that a little thicker plastic screen protector couldn't be provided.
customer_reviews.author: Carl A Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Best phone case I could find
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to have texture for a phone case that's easy to grip and this delivers. I love the way the defenders feel in my hand. Other phone cases are smoother which I find easy to drop. Despite not having the screen protector it is well designed and durable. I tried other brand tempered glass screen protectors and none fit the screen correctly and most would be pushed off the screen. I opted for a durable/flexible screen cover. Don't go cheap. It fits perfect and doesn't lift off the screen. I dropped my S8 multiple times outside with zero problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler will

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: First, I will emphasize that what was sent to me was NOT an Otterbox Defender for a Samsung Galaxy S8. It was an Otterbox but I suspect it was either for a different model phone or was not a Defender series at all. It came broken and I was never able to get it to properly fit my phone (hence my suspicion that it was for another model. I have had the Defender since I bought my phone and have always been really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford E. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: The phone belt clip holder is really janky...UPDATE DON'T BUY THIS GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: The case itself seems fine but the belt clip holder is really janky and doesn't fit the phone very good... I'll update when I lose my phone....UPDATE::: PIECE OF GARBAGE I KNEW BETTER WHEN I RECEIVED THIS ITEM IT WAS GARBAGE NOW MY PHONE IS SCRAP..PHONE CLIP ALLOWED MY PHONE TO FALL OUT AND IT GOT RAN OVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Defender fits my Note 8 perfectly and there were no issues with third party glass screen protector.
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit. Outer case fits tight over inner case. Looks great and I expect that it will do a great job protecting my phone. This is my third defender series. 1st for Galaxy S4, 2nd for Note 5 and now for my Note 8. S4 had a few falls which landed on the corner. It didn't hurt my phone at all, was I relieved. It makes the extra weight worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: gnagle8520

customer_reviews.title: The Otter box works great not my first one either.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is a light gray wit blue trim better than black when in a car looking for my cell. When you need your phone out of the case just peel the rubber case off and then the 4 clips on the corners and out pops the cell. Gravity get the best best of my cell phone but the Otter has always been there to protect.
customer_reviews.author: G Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Does not completely protect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Phone has never been taken out of the case since August. Opened it yesterday to clean it and the back of my phone is completely shattered. No idea how long it’s been like that. Not very happy. I’ve never known of anyone (myself included- Me and my entire family always use otterbox) destroy a phone with an otter box defender. I’ve always used otterbox but this one let my phone get ruined. 😡 I gave the durability one star because That was the lowest it would rate. Otherwise it would have gotten NONE
customer_reviews.author: Amber Craft

customer_reviews.title: Hardcore Case!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how hardcore this case actually is. I drop my phone on average twice a day and this case has been perfect! If you set it face down, the screen doesn't touch, which is great but I still like having a screen protector. Haven't found the perfect screen protector yet, but I can definitely recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Annette S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I get an otter box for all my phones that I've had and each one has done a great job of protecting the phone. This one is no different. My only complaint is there is no screen protection. I realize it's no fault of otterbox as it would be hard to make a cover for the screen and still use all the features the phone has to offer. It is still a great product and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case!
customer_reviews.text: Great solid case. Does the job. Definitely drop my phone a lot and this has kept my phone safe. Only annoying bit is that the flap over the power port is a little stiff and it presses on the cord while its charging which I think has made my power port loose over time. However, it helps waterproof the phone and power ports become loose over time. Good news is that the Galaxy s8 does support wireless charging. Though I haven't tried it yet so I'm not sure if it will work through the case. Kind of wish it had a screen protector but I like having access to my phone screen (which is why I chose this one).
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Protection at its finest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case about a six months ago for my Samsung Galaxy S8 and I have loved it! It is easy to hold and, while at first may make the phone seem huge, it really doesn't intrude on anything. Ports are easily accessible and the volume up/down/power buttons are not hard to operate. The build quality is solid and I have dropped my phone with this case on from many different heights, and it has not damaged the phone at all (although the case has a few chips in it but that's to be expected). I love OtterBox and will definitely be buying from them again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Favorite case
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a fingerprint reader so that is why it is one star. I have had many other boxes and this is the only one after using the product for years that the rubber has not pealed on the back of it or the rubber comes off the plastic that holds it in the case. This is my 3rd one for the Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.author: BUBBA

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Otterbox buyer.  This one was a fail.
customer_reviews.text: I have always relied on Otterbox to provide me quality protection for my phones over the years so I turned to them again for my Galaxy S8. I have seen people complain about the lack of screen protection but that has not been an issue for me. However, 8 months after buying and with no known drops, the bottom of the case cracked. Once the initial small crack showed, the shell no longer stays in place and more cracks have appeared. My case is under warranty but Otterbox charged an absurd $6 to ship the replacement. Really disappointed in Otterbox this time.
customer_reviews.author: Kecaps

customer_reviews.title: Case does not fit phone with the alpha glass
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with the Alpha Glass, the case does not close properly with the alpha glass on the phone. Also the power button doesn't seem to line up correctly and it is difficult to wake phone. Furthermore the alpha glass does not seem to work with the phone, i have to press very hard to get the phone to respond, very irritating. I expect more from OtterBox, i have owned there products in the past and have always been happy with them, and thought they worth the price. I will be returning these items.
customer_reviews.author: Odraf

customer_reviews.title: Gave it's life for my phone.
customer_reviews.text: The front plastic cover is rather delicate and snapped when I dropped my phone. No damage to my phone, but I did have to buy a replacement. Later on, I snapped the belt clip frame while bending over. I've snapped clips off of other skeleton clips, but this was the first otterbox clip i'd broke, and it didn't fail at the clip, only the corner edge of the frame. I happily purchased a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect case for a parent. My children always take my phone and have dropped it multiple times on the street and floor and my phone hasn't cracked at all. It's very stylish and the phone is still pretty thin with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe D

customer_reviews.title: Phone damaged from a 3 foot fall with the case on.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case and holster, however it provides absolutely no protection. I dropped the phone from about 3 feet with the case and holster on the phone, and the bottom corner of the screen cracked.
customer_reviews.author: s.snyder

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and it does the job. He is really hard on his phone while working and so far no problems when it falls or gets dropped. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Best case on the market, especially if you prefer to use your own tempered glass screen protector.
customer_reviews.text: I've used every case out there over the years. I avoided Otterbox for years because of the price and size. I was a Spigen guy for years. After my last Spigen broke, I tried a Supcase Unicorn Beetle Pro. It was a decent case but broke within a few days and was not tempered glass friendly. I fonally broke broke down and ordered an Otterbox Defender because I saw there was a screenless version, and I am sold. There is a reason they are the most popular cases out there. Unmatched protection and I absolutely love being able to use my own tempered glass screen protector, because I hate the built in ones.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy & No Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: The case feels like a normal Otterbox Defender Case. I have always loved the Otterbox Defender Series, but there is no screen protector and the sides by the curved screen are very flimsy. The plastic part feels very weak. I love Ottherbox but this is not their usual standards.
customer_reviews.author: TechnologyEnthusiast21

customer_reviews.title: Cover works, but not as good as the old style Otterbox cover
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Otterbox. The previous one I liked better as it also had the cover for the screen. I like this OtterBox defender that I purchased for my Samsung S8. Being a light color, it does pick up dye from my jeans and looks dirty easier. It protects my phone when I have dropped it on cement, but I wish it had the screen protector like the old ones did. I use a Zagg screen protector which I have mixed feelings about as it comes off the screen at times.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have never liked the look of otter boxes for their size and bulk. This one for my Galaxy S8 is quite nice though! It doesn't have a screen protector due to the rounded screen. My beveled screen protector does fit on after the case has been applied though which is nice. I'll keep buying them if otter keeps up this streamlined feel. As a side note, I will never buy a beveled screen again.
customer_reviews.author: lordmattbob

customer_reviews.title: Protects your phone and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This case has the quality and ruggedness you would expect from OtterBox. It perfectly form fits the case, and having two layers of protection really gives me some peace of mind. There's no screen protector, but the S8's gorilla glass should stop anything that would typically damage your screen, like keys. The raised edges of the case will prevent the phone from falling on the screen as well, reducing impact damage. OtterBox cases are usually the only things I'll trust my phone in.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy just what she needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters new phone. Durable and sturdy just what she needs. The only downside, if you can call it an actual downside, is it is pretty hard to get on and off. Which is good because it wont just pop off accidentally, but if you need it off for any reason it might be a bit difficult. So not necessarily a bad thing, just cumbersome. Overall we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: One month in, good so far
customer_reviews.text: The Vinyasa color is very pretty and is as pictured in the listing. I have had this case for about a month and so far, so good. I previously had the same case in the aqua mint color and it stretched out over time; however, this one seems to be a better fit from the start. I like that this style doesn't add a lot of bulk to my phone, yet it seems very sturdy. I highly recommend getting a glass screen protector, as the screen is what's most likely to break in the event of dropping your phone. I would not expect any case alone to protect from a broken screen.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Angerman

customer_reviews.title: Great case to protect your S8
customer_reviews.text: Great cases. Adds alot to the size of the phone. Smaller hands may have issues. Bought this for my wife. I recently tried another brand UAG bc the Otterbox Defender Series does great for protection but the rubber seems to stretch after several months and it annoys me.
customer_reviews.author: Walter L.

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but it'll do.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give half stars I would have given 3.5, but I settled for 3 instead. The case comes in 3 pieces, 2 that clip together (I got the pink/purple version, so the pink parts clip together)and one outside rubber sleeve that wraps around them (in my case, purple. My pink pieces had some broken clips which is why I'm giving 3 stars. If the purple wrap around piece wasn't there to hold it all together it would have gotten 1, but overall the case is still usable. A little overpriced for broken pieces, but overall usable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S8 Otter Box
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a replacement Otter Box for my Samsung Galaxy S8 smartphone! This was just like the old one I had! This Otter Box version does NOT have a screen protector, but does have the hoster/clip! The Otter Box should be the first step in protecting your phone from daily activities!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamTop Contributor: Country Music

customer_reviews.title: Fair Price and Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: Great protection. I also have the Otterbox Symmetry for the Galaxy S8 (sleeker but doesn't seem to offer as much protection). Only complaint is the case has a faint smell to it. Hard to describe the smell (maybe rubbery). Not the worse smell but I noticed it on my hands after using my phone. Case is definitely the cause as it disappeared after washing hands and returned when I used my phone. Hoping it goes away after a few days, but if it doesn't it's not the end of the world
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit the Plus
customer_reviews.text: The description said this was for the Samsung galaxy S8 plus. It is not. It is for the S8. It is too short to fit the plus. I am returning it. We always use the same case on my husbands phone he is pretty rough on his phones and this case does the trick. Now I just need to find the correct size
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Come loose in the holster if not careful when snapped ...
customer_reviews.text: Come loose in the holster if not careful when snapped in to the belt clip but fits the phone well.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This case surprised me with sleek protection design. Normally, Otterbox bulky and difficult to hold for long periods of time. The feel of the case is smooth, comfortable and very stylishly creative. Love it. Fits easily into crossbody purse and my backpack pocket. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Eye4detail1974

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I love the color options but I'm very disappointed in the quality of the case. The plastic feels cheap and fragile, as if I might break it trying to get it on my phone. I expected something much nicer from Otter Box, like all the cases I've bought from them in the past but I guess I can't rely on them anymore. I can get a Zizo case for 1/4th the price, better quality and it comes with a glass screen proector!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: My only issue is the case gets dirty and stained quite easily and is not easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Case appears to work well. My only issue is the case gets dirty and stained quite easily and is not easy to clean. I started getting marks on the case within the 1st week.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. At first I was very wishy washy on the color because I'm not really into pink but the case is actually very cute and the colors go together very nicely. It's really nice in that it doesn't really slip when you're holding it and I love the durability. I don't use the belt clip but would be helpful to anyone who wanted to. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst buy ever! Doesn't protect the screen just the the side and the back. iPhone covers have edges that pop up so if the phone drops flat it protects it. This is waste of money. My other other box for iPhone is just awesome. They need to do a better job with this Samsung cover.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Definitely more streamlined compared to older otterbox
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Samsung S8 perfectly, easy to hold, no problems using the charging port or earphone port. I did not place a screen protector yet or have I dropped my phone so I can't comment on durability, but I'm hoping it is as durable as my last otterbox which I had for years and no problems after many drops, but I feel my last otterbox was thicker a d last phone more durable than the OLED screen on the S8 so I'm being very careful with my phonr
customer_reviews.author: Sgtbotox

customer_reviews.title: but needed a new one and liked the color
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a black otterbox for quite some time, but needed a new one and liked the color. However, ever since I got it, I'm having touchscreen issues with the otterbox on. It start with my pokemon go, but now the whole phone and the power button doesn't work with the protector on. I may contact the seller, but my previous otterbox. Took my phone out of the otterbox and touchscreen is working better than ever before. The otterbox i originally had came from walmart worked much better, and that is a route I may end up going with.. Will update this review if I discover it's my phone, but only had these issues since purchasing this specific otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Galaxy S8 and am very pleased I chose to pay a little extra and order this case. Fits like a glove, feels great in my hand, looks great and seems like it will protect my phone if it drops (although, haven't tested that yet). The belt clip is also a handy extra. Worth the purchase! UPDATE: Have now had this case for 5 months and have dropped my phone (on concrete) several times and not a scratch on the phone. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great as always
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox cases are always durable and do their job well. This is my second time purchasing this case for a Galaxy S8 because how well my personal one has held up. The only issues I have are that if you do not likely bulky phones that this case will make the phone a decent bit larger and after a year or longer of opening and closing the charge port cover the rubber cover started to not stay as firmly secured. It is not the most flashy case but if you prioritize protecting your phone over how it looks OtterBox is always a instant purchase when I get new phones be it personal or for work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Swiggum

customer_reviews.title: Good case but not great for film screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: Great case but would be even better with a screen protector. Does not do well with a film screen protector as it causes bubbles. Good grip and corner protection from what I have seen
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Dingy
customer_reviews.text: The case works as it should but it's gotten dingy. Ive had otter boxes in the past and had hope they had created a way to stop that but nope. Also it didn't come in a otter box package just in a plain box. I know that doesn't matter but that wouldve been nice. Oh and by the way. NOTHING cleans it! I've tried the dishwasher,dawn,professional cleaning chemicals etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri

customer_reviews.title: For the past 10 years or so, I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: For the past 10 years or so, I've had Motorolas and haven't needed a case. Unfortunately, the Galaxy S8 is so fragile that even a drop of a couple of inches leads to glass breakage. So, hello Defender. (Got the Alpha Glass, too.) While I haven't dropped it to test, my wife and daughters have had many a phone saved by OtterBox in the past.
customer_reviews.author: KDodds

customer_reviews.title: Great, snug case
customer_reviews.text: Fits the phone great, so far it's protected it well, my only complaint is a lack of screen protector for the curved edge, but the case is designed around it and adding a screen protector to the case would be really tough to accomplish cleanly. Overall, great case, both my wife and I use this case.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Eh not the best
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't appear to be as sturdy or tough as the Galaxy Note 5 otter box case. It's a pain in the butt taking it on and off and when I have my bunker ring on the back, the rubber part of the case peels back. Cheaply made :(
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality on the camo orange
customer_reviews.text: Quality is a lot less than it was two years ago. I bought this same exact color (camo cover with Realtree) for my galaxy s6, and carried it in my pocket for two years and it held up great. Now I have bought the same thing for the galaxy s8 and the camo is already wearing off and looks horrible after 1 month of use. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Repairguru

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case. Poor instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of the case. I did not like the lack of clear instructions on how to open the case and install the phone. It is pretty similar to other past products but damage may be possible to case if not opened properly.
customer_reviews.author: J Landers

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY IF YOU CARE ABOUT LOOKS/COSMETICS!!! RIP OFF ALERT!!!
customer_reviews.text: The tree design in the back looks cool at first but is very cheap and scratches instantly. In less than 3 months, it was completely gone for me and all that was left was a plain white mess with minimal traces of the tree design. The product otherwise is solid. I have dropped my phone a dozen times and never had any issues. But as I am a professional in a client-oriented service business, I cannot have a phone that looks like crap as it reflects poorly on me and my business. If you care about looks as well, do not waste your money on this product. You will feel ripped off. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio R.

customer_reviews.title: OTTERBOX FAILS THIS TIME
customer_reviews.text: Normally Otterbox delivers a great durable product. Holster and case failed after 2 mos. Phone kept dropping off holster. At first thought it was not being clipped in properly: but not the "case"! After making sure clipped securly into holster, phone still dropped cracking screen protector I had purchased specifically for the "Otterbox" case. Would not recommend. Looking at other products for a replacement. :(
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Saved the phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for Samsung S8. I also added a glass screen protector. The Otter Box Defender saved my son's phone when he accidently left it on the top of the car and started down a highway entrance ramp. He heard the phone tumble off the car and saw it hit the pavement. The Otter Box was damaged but the phone was U damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Plumblee

customer_reviews.title: It's old school but in a class all its own.
customer_reviews.text: I tried slimmer cases but they were too smooth and slipped from my shirt pocket. Other beefier cases wouldn't work with my stand charger. If you don't mind the extra girth, maybe extra cost and old school styling, you simply can't beat an Otterbox for durability and protection. That's my humble assessment.
customer_reviews.author: Eins Vonuno

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my sons phone on amazon because i found it for a good price. Walmart wanted $50 and it was $29 on here. It holds up well, holds my sons phone in place. Its durable and saved his phone many times. I'd buy this case again
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Our family only uses otter box defender cases. They keep our phones safe from dropping them on cement many times, dropping them in sinks, toilets, mud, everything! We have them on all of our phones and I pads. They are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: AHENYAN

customer_reviews.title: Crap durability like every Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: Great case, junk durability. Every Otterbox I've had never holds up for long. Corners end up floppy and the durability just lacks. Do yourself a favor and look up "Scooch" cases. They even have built in stands and clip onto your car vents...
customer_reviews.author: SteelTX

customer_reviews.title: staying in holster
customer_reviews.text: I have had otter boxes before and they were outstanding but this one it seems as if the locks that hold it to the holster are not as strong as it has caused my phone to fall out several times.Maybe the indentations on the side need to be deeper to grip the phone better once its in the otter box.
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Great Protective Case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Fits phone snug and has enough of a raised edge to protect my s8. Remember to take the layers apart to place phone inside! I got ahead of myself and it took me a minute to figure it out. Other than that...it's pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mills

customer_reviews.title: the Otter box I feel is the better case. The phone clips into the case right
customer_reviews.text: After trying a handful of cases, the Otter box I feel is the better case. The phone clips into the case right. I don't have to worry about the phone coming out. I've tried the Lifeproof Case which worked ok. One would think that Lifeproof would be better since Otter box and Lifeproof are the same company. I also have a glass screen protector. Overall, I'm happy with the case.
customer_reviews.author: pettis63

customer_reviews.title: TONS of drops, absolutely NO damage! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I am the WORST person with keeping a phone intact and unharmed. I did quiet a bit of research on the right case for this phone. I was very worried about not having the screen protector for this phone but with this case you dont even need it! I have had the case for months now with MANY drops and there is not so much of a scratch on my phone. I am extremely impressed with how well the case protects! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Cringe-Proof
customer_reviews.text: I love OtterBoxes. I'm a huge klutz, typically dropping the thing a dozen or more times a day. So often I will see a friend dropping their phone visibly cringe. Will the screen be cracked? Will it turn back on at all? My screen is perfect. No scratches at all, even though I have had the phone at least a year. This is a great way to protect my investment in the new phone. The peace of mind it gives me is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: OUTTERBOX DEFENDER-THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Quality really shows in this cell phone protective case. It protects your phone in most every way imaginable. The OtterBox Defender, you can't go wrong especially at these prices. And I have never had any damage to a phone by it falling out of the belt clip carrier, it just doesn't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: 'LiL' Rascal

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: The color is a little different than the picture but I loved the color. The finger print reader does not work well with the case on. The case keeps my phone same. It is easy to take the cover off when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Jeska

customer_reviews.title: It's a case and it looks good. Wireless charging works through it.
customer_reviews.text: Wireless charging works. No kickstand on it and I didn't need the holster but it's alright. It's sleek and I don't like screen protectors. I think it obstructs the peripheral of the speaker a bit but I really don't mind too much. As long as my phone doesn't slip out of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Good, but they need to incorporate a screen saver ...
customer_reviews.text: Good, but they need to incorporate a screen saver with it as they do for other phones, very hard to find a screen saver that works for the S8 and also woks with this case
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Solid Protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove...an armored glove. My only concern, and it is mostly the fault of the phone, is the design allowing for the curved screen to be used exposes a chink in the armor, the side is not as well protected as the rest. Other than that, the buttons all work, charging cables fit and headphones plug in.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Both Layers are broken in under a year of usage
customer_reviews.text: I got the case and not too long after the outside layer started stretching out. Then parts of the case started pealing where the camera cut out it. Recently the plastic clips on the hard case broke. I am not rough on the phone. It should have withstood a lot more than what it did.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, not what you'd expect from Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: Just received and installed this case on my phone. My first disappointment was that the top frame of the case was broken on the bottom right corner! I don't know if it came this way, but there must have been some defect as I am not a strong person and watched the installation video. Upon further review there is a small gap between the screen protector (not included) and the case. I feel like moisture/ debris could enter there and cause damage. I don't think the clip actually works as a stand, either. This case did not live up to the Otterbox name.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: Otterbox Defender Series Screenless Edition for Samsung Galaxy s8 - Frustration Free Packaging - Bespoke Way (Blazer Blue/Stormy Seas Blue)
product_meta.description: Color:BESPOKE WAY (BLAZER BLUE/STORMY SEAS BLUE)| Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingWorry Less While You’re Working, Adventuring and Living When You Defend Your Device Against Drops, Dirt and Scrapes. The New Screen less Defender Series Is Specifically Designed for the Galaxy s8 Curved Touchscreen. Combining a Solid Internal Shell With a Resilient Outer Slipcover, Defender Series Deflects the Action and Accidents That Come Your Way Every Day. Plus, the Included Holster Doubles as a Kickstand for Hands-Free Viewing.
feature_bullets: Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S8 (only, Not the Galaxy S8+)
Multi-layer defense: solid inner shell and soft outer cover (No Built in Screen Protector)
Belt-clip holster included that doubles as a kickstand for hands-free media viewing.
Port covers keep out dust and debris
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details) and 100% authentic.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars6,458 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
